import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.css'] }) export class RegistrationComponent { isTeacher: boolean = false; nextPage = false; chooseRoleTeacher(): void { this.isTeacher = true; this.nextPage = true; } chooseRoleStudent(): void { this.isTeacher = false; this.nextPage = true; } previousPage(): void { this.nextPage = false; } }
